QuestData.Title: Through the Nether
QuestData.Description: The rituals have been disrupted, yet the nether beacons still glow with power....$b$bThis can only mean that the beacons are powered from within the Twisting Nether itself!$b$bThe connection to the void must be severed! There is but one way to accomplish this; you must slay the void creature that maintains the connection with our world.$b$bLay your hands upon a beacon and travel into the Twisting Nether. When you have arrived on the other side, locate a Shamanstone and use it to contact me.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The voice of Kalandrios whispers to you upon the wind.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: The voice of Kalandrios whispers to you upon the wind.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use a Void Beacon to travel to the Twisting Nether.
QuestData.CompletionText: The veil between dimensions is thin. Do you hear my words through the shaman stone?
QuestData.RewardText: The Shamanstone appears to be working, even from within the Twisting Nether.$b$bThere is much that needs to be done, $n. The monsters of the void are gathering upon Oshu'gun and must be stopped, else they invade our realm.
